Class TCPMonitor

java.lang.Object
  |

        |
        +--com.anthonyeden.jnm.monitor.TCPMonitor
public class TCPMonitor
extends Monitor

Monitor implementation which uses a tests a remote host using a TCP socket.

Author:
Anthony Eden
